attributes.action: Refund the 1% Charged to first time buyers since the January incentive window
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Trying to get the unfortunate few who missed out on the first stamp duty break after the 1st of jan and the governments announcement for the under 250K break, refunded for us first time buyers who are already stretched due to the over priced weak housing market.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
